titleStmt.title: We hereby think fit to will and require all officers and souldiers, immediately to repair to their respective commands ... by the Lord Lieutenant General, and General Governour of Ireland, Ormonde.
titleStmt.author: Ireland. Lord Lieutenant (1677-1685 : Ormonde)
Ormonde, James Butler, Duke of, 1610-1688.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Benjamin Took ... and are to be sold by Mary Crooke ...,

notesStmt.note: Title from first 3 lines of text.
Statement of responsibility transposed from head of title.
"Given at His Majesties Castle of Dublin, the tenth day of February 1684/5."
Reproduction of original in the Society of Antiquaries Library, London.
